alert.note: Alert for Carter (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:39PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Carter County through 115 PM CDT... At 1239 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Garwood, or 8 miles northeast of Van Buren, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Carter County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
